description: Detects netsh commands that configure a port forwarding (PortProxy)
false_positives: WSL2 network bridge PowerShell script used for WSL/Kubernetes/Docker (e.g. https://github.com/microsoft/WSL/issues/4150#issuecomment-504209723)
name: Netsh Port Forwarding
query: (process.executable.text:*\\netsh.exe AND ((process.command_line.text:*interface* AND process.command_line.text:*portproxy* AND process.command_line.text:*add* AND process.command_line.text:*v4tov4*) OR (process.command_line.text:*connectp* AND process.command_line.text:*listena* AND process.command_line.text:*c\=*)))
author: Florian Roth
omkar72
oscd.community
